alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:14PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm outflows will impact portions of southeastern Blaine, southwestern Oneida, southwestern Power, Cassia and southern Minidoka Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 612 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm outflows in the Southern Highlands/Raft river moving east at 20 to 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burley, Rupert, Heyburn, Malta, Lake Walcott, Oakley Reservoir, Paul, Oakley, Declo, Rockland, Albion, Juniper, Cold Water Rest Area, Elba, Almo, Acequia, Yale Rest Area, Massacre Rocks, Stone and City Of Rocks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
